title: Activity against Mycobacterium tuberculosis of a new class of spirooxindolopyrrolidine embedded chromanone hybrid heterocycles
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11604-11613
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01501K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Manal Fahad Alkaltham, Abdulrahman I. Almansour, Natarajan Arumugam, Siva Krishna Vagolu, Tone Tønjum, Shatha Ibrahim Alaqeel, Saiswaroop Rajaratnam, Venketesh Sivaramakrishnan
Spirooxindolopyrrolidines were synthesized in quantitative yield through cycloaddition strategy. Compounds exhibited significant anti-tubercular activity and molecular docking studies of the compound is well correlates with in vitro findings.
